prereq.p: The following steps assume that you have a domain model file in your project. To appear in base-class browsing window, the base-class must be referenceable (for example, have a primary key).

step.cmd: In the Project Explorer view pane, double-click the domain model file that you want to work with.
step.stepresult: The file and its elements are displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd:
In the Editor area, right-click the domain model file name (which is usually the first node) and select
New Dataset
.
Go to the Properties view pane located below the Editor area and complete the fields to edit the dataset's properties.
